title: Healthily: Self-Care & Health Journal
description: Designed by doctors, used by millions Healthily is the free, award-winning self-care app that helps you look after you every day. Manage hundreds of conditions, check your symptoms, track your progress and more. From helping you decide when to see a doctor, to making small changes to feel better every day, Healthily brings you the self-care tools you need, wherever you are. Talk to our friendly chatbot about your symptoms, browse our world-class health library, plus use our journal and trackers to look after your health with confidence. How Healthily works Understand your health, take action and build healthier habits, step by step. ASSESS: Talk to DOT, our friendly chatbot who helps you check your health. LEARN: Get tailored tips on wellbeing, and explore trusted information in our world-class health library. TRACK: See what’s working with our health journal and trackers. FIND: Find vetted products and services in our OneStop Health™ marketplace. MANAGE: Learn how to manage your symptoms from home. Join millions of people already living Healthily “This is the best app I ever installed” - @Emanuel Tănasă, Google Play “Very accurate and always on point with information” - @Jesseina Torres, Google Play “This is like carrying a personal doctor in your pocket” - @Rising Sun, Google Play “The best health app so far” - @Likando Ilishebo, Google Play “Love this app and especially the journal” - @Sondre Eftedal Blom, Google Play From coronavirus to mental health, we’re in this together Get self-care info validated by doctors on hundreds of health conditions like: • Coronavirus (COVID-19) • Colds and flu • Back pain • Sore throat • Headaches • Sexual health • Sleep and tiredness • Anxiety and depression Everything we do is medically approved Our in-house doctors review and approve all our health and self-care content under the guidance of our clinical advisory board, which is made up of world-renowned medical experts. Healthily is registered as a Class I Medical Device with the Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency (MHRA). It’s CE accredited – meaning our services follow EU Medical Device legislation. Look after yourself safely If you don’t have a chronic or rare medical condition, our app could be right for you. Healthily can’t consider everything a doctor can, or identify every condition or symptom. We don’t diagnose or give medical advice. Our information isn’t appropriate for babies, children aged 15 and younger, or if you’re pregnant, on immunosuppressive treatment or have complex or long-term conditions. Read our terms of service and how to use Healthily safely. Your data is safe with us too Our chatbot, health tracker and journal have the ePrivacy seal of approval, so you know your data is private and protected. Read our privacy policy.
descriptionHTML:
Designed by doctors, used by millions
Healthily is the free, award-winning self-care app that helps you look after you every day. Manage hundreds of conditions, check your symptoms, track your progress and more.

From helping you decide when to see a doctor, to making small changes to feel better every day, Healthily brings you the self-care tools you need, wherever you are.

Talk to our friendly chatbot about your symptoms, browse our world-class health library, plus use our journal and trackers to look after your health with confidence.

How Healthily works
Understand your health, take action and build healthier habits, step by step.

ASSESS: Talk to DOT, our friendly chatbot who helps you check your health.

LEARN: Get tailored tips on wellbeing, and explore trusted information in our world-class health library.

TRACK: See what’s working with our health journal and trackers.

FIND: Find vetted products and services in our OneStop Health™ marketplace.

MANAGE: Learn how to manage your symptoms from home.

Join millions of people already living Healthily

“This is the best app I ever installed” - @Emanuel Tănasă, Google Play

“Very accurate and always on point with information” - @Jesseina Torres, Google Play

“This is like carrying a personal doctor in your pocket” - @Rising Sun, Google Play

“The best health app so far” - @Likando Ilishebo, Google Play

“Love this app and especially the journal” - @Sondre Eftedal Blom, Google Play

From coronavirus to mental health, we’re in this together
Get self-care info validated by doctors on hundreds of health conditions like:

• Coronavirus (COVID-19)

• Colds and flu

• Back pain

• Sore throat

• Headaches

• Sexual health

• Sleep and tiredness

• Anxiety and depression

Everything we do is medically approved
Our in-house doctors review and approve all our health and self-care content under the guidance of our clinical advisory board, which is made up of world-renowned medical experts.

Healthily is registered as a Class I Medical Device with the Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency (MHRA). It’s CE accredited – meaning our services follow EU Medical Device legislation.

Look after yourself safely
If you don’t have a chronic or rare medical condition, our app could be right for you.

Healthily can’t consider everything a doctor can, or identify every condition or symptom. We don’t diagnose or give medical advice.

Our information isn’t appropriate for babies, children aged 15 and younger, or if you’re pregnant, on immunosuppressive treatment or have complex or long-term conditions.

Read our terms of service and how to use Healthily safely.

Your data is safe with us too
Our chatbot, health tracker and journal have the ePrivacy seal of approval, so you know your data is private and protected.

Read our privacy policy.
summary: Track and manage your health with the award-winning self-care app.
summaryHTML: Track and manage your health with the award-winning self-care app.
recentChanges:
GOODBYE, BACK PAIN. HELLO, NEW BACK PAIN HUB. Introducing our new Back Pain Hub – designed by our doctors to help you get better, faster. Try it free for 7 days.

·  TRACK YOURSELF BETTER
Discover the 6 habits of happy backs, then track them – and see your progress.

 ·  STRENGTHEN YOUR BACK
Try the 16 must-do exercises and stretches recommended by our physio.

·  ESCAPE YOUR PAIN
Learn simple breathing and relaxation techniques to help you tackle your pain in minutes.

comments: This is a really good app. I think it could use some more features like pain location and number scale.
I'm loving it. I loved the revamped UI design. Seems like I won't be needing another health app. Keep it up!
makes tracking my health much easier and has built in symptom checker too!
plenty of information, good amount of advice, wasn't able to recommend healthy practices specific to my condition.

There could be more choices as to things to track. More importantly, I've had notes that I've written disappear. I know if I get here and record things about my condition, I write a note and there aren't always notes.
Very useful used few times a week.
great app for health .and .very education
Need Healthy Habits.....Great Choice....your in control....
It was good but now I can't connect!

So far this app is fairly good. I like that it's free and pretty simple and gives links to places which give more information on what you need. I feel like the chat bot shouldn't straight away diagnose you with a condition only after you answer a few easy questions, but overall I don't mind this app at all and it's good for keeping track of day to day life :)

I rarely review apps but this app i just had to. The chatbot was phenomenal and gave me advise with what i should do. The only problem i had on this app is when only male and female was there when you start, I understand that you are trying to make this app better but it would be appreciated if you fix this sooner then later. Thank you.

Not as expected when compared to description; less comprehensive overall. Seemed to function okay, didn't crash, operated smoothly, but did not meet expectations I had based on description. Cannot find a way to completely DELETE my account (I can log out, but not delete). Please delete my account. Thank you.

Hello! I can't open the app after updating, it just shows blank page and then closes. I'm still on android version 5.1 if it helps. I really like this app as a health checker, hope it gets a fix soon.

A library if health answers and daily health education. A great way to work on self-care. I am always finding ways to help others and often forget "me". This app helps me to find ways to take care of me.

This App is really awesome! And is so much help and helpful to motivate you and pay more attention to yourself and how your feeling. It's like a friend thats there to help you! Thank you so much it has been so helpful!

There's only one thing that would improve my experience with this app. I'd like the option to go back to the previous day to add or modify items in the daily tracker. Sometimes I forget to fill it in. I'd like the option of going back to fill in the info
This is a great app that offers Daily insights, a helpful assistant, and a Symptom tracker, & a Health Journal where you can annotate anything you feel may be of relevance later. I love it!
Was kind of liking the app but it reset itself 5 days into the 4 week programs so I lost all progress. Not starting again, clearly a bug needs to be fixed.
It is a great app, but my only complaint is that it won't always give a diagnosis, it will just say seek medical help immediately. But other than that this is a very good app.
The app is really great in keeping you healthy. The Sympton checker is also great, but I don't think it should replace the hospital for users.

I tried to open the app and when it asked for my birth year I put 2006,it said the app was only for 16-100 but I dont get why,people under the age of 16 might need help too this app is limiting chances of people the age of 15 and under to get help,apart from this I think the app is quite good for those over 16 as it can help them with things they didnt know they could use help with or give them more help. In conclusion good app but improve on the age situation please as I want to try it.
It's extremely difficult to opt out of sharing info for this app partners. Firstly a cookies acceptance pop up window covers your screen when trying to read about setting privacy and cookies.

Pretty useless if you have certain health condition and would like to track specific symptoms. Does not allow customizing symptoms to track. Most of info provided is for folks who are illiterate in health topic
I love everything about the app, chatting, direct answers, the consultation too. Great app. 5star from me

I have a headache today and app sent me almost strait to the doctor as a serious issue. Not sure one of headache is that serious and reason might be any. Also I would welcome dark version (theme) of the app. Headache and white screen is not good.
I like the App, lot of very good features. The symptom checker bot just don't understand my sentences completely. Like I typed kidney pain, and it list it as pain on abdominal side...?
It really helps to journal how I'm feeling so I can look back when I need to. Very handy & helpful app.
The last update keeps saying error 😡😠 and apps no longer works. Though previously this app was very useful to me but now its just a garbage in my phone storage.
very good. like it has a weekly plan lile say if you have trouble sleeping week one would be on improving on that and week 2 would be a differnt target. really really really good.

App won't connect to Samsung Health. I had connected it to Google Fit but then changed my mind due to not having the Fit Watch thingy to get my heart rate. Now app seems dependent on Google Fit and Wil not me unlink it to link to Samsung Healt... Help plz
Interactive, informative, accumulative and comprehensive.. Honest compilation to take care of all your health concerns and risks
Very helpful. the good thing about this app is that it constantly reminds you that it is not a solution But a means for help.
Unable to register with email address. Keep on receiving error message, even after uninstall and reinstall.

I am not even able to open the app. It always says error occoured, and says my email id is already in use...I have never used this app before, then how it is possible that my mail id is in use ?? Very bad first impression ☹️ ☹️
i find the information very helpful and plentiful , easy to navigate, great for looking in to symptoms and illness

I've tried other health apps to learn on health issues and it did'nt satisfy my want for knoledge regarding health problems until I use this app. It's a very indespenseble tool and works superb, my outmost thanks to the developer of this, God Bless You guys!
I has always been a great app. But after update it keeps crashing ..Please Fix this.
I found it easy to follow and think that anything that anyone can do for scientific value is a must.
The app keeps saying error when signing in or creating a new account. Wasted of time downloading the app
Very easy to use. Simple layout and bold lettering.
